p.s: Emended description of the genus Pontibacter Nedashkovskaya et al. 2005
Pontibacter (Pon.ti.bac′ter. L. n. pontus the sea; N.L. masc. n. bacter from Gr. neut. n. baktron rod; N.L. masc. n. Pontibacter a marine bacterium).
Main characteristics are as those given for the genus description by Nedashkovskaya et al. (2005), with the following emendments.
Certain member species are capable of gliding, whereas others are non-motile.
The type species is Pontibacter actiniarum.
